attributes.description: The CX-3 will take you there. Features include: Engine power output: 115kW/206Nm - Electronic power assist steering; 16 inch Alloy Wheels; Automatic On/Off Halogen headlamps; LED Front fog lights; Front rain-sensing wipers; Temperature display; Advanced keyless push-button engine start; Smart Advanced keyless entry; Trip computer; 6 Airbags SRS: Front (driver and passenger, side and curtain); Hill Launch Assist (HLA); Anti-lock Braking System (ABS); Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD); Emergency Brake Assist (EBA); Electronic Park Brake (EPB); Dynamic Stability Control (DSC); Power windows (front and rear); Cloth seat trim. Height adjustable seat – Driver; Rear seat with 60/40 fold backrest and centre armrest with cupholders; Auto Aircon; Cruise control; Leather-wrapped Multifunctional steering wheel with audio controls; Tilt and telescopic adjustable steering wheel; Front centre console armrest; Leather-wrapped gear shift knob; Rear Parking sensors; Auto dimming rear view mirror; Radio - CD player/AUX jack/2 USB ports; MZD Connect system 7-Inch display screen; 6 Speakers; Bluetooth® handsfree connection; Internet radio integration (Pandora®, Sticher and AHA); Power windows one-touch system (driver); Remote central locking; ISOFIX. EURO NCAP 5-STAR SAFETY RATING The vehicle has a 3 year / unlimited mileage Warranty 3 year / unlimited mileage Service Plan as well as Roadside Assistance.

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
